extendedInfo.description: Thunder, thunder, thundercats HOOOOOO!Hold the Sword Of Omens in your hands and feel it's power!Swing the Sword just like Liono to summon the ThunderCats!Also this app lets you gain sight beyond sight!The application uses the accelerometer to trigger Lionos voice.Purely a tribute to one of my favorite series as a child :)

reviews.comment: Only one single minor gripe. The Ho sound cuts off too soon. Should include the roar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent novelty app. I hope the dev comes through with the camera/sight beyond sight feature
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: As soon as the sight beyond sight is finally official I would give 5 star rating other than that love the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t install
reviews.comment: Downloads but says there\'s insufficient storage space when I clearly have enough space. It might be my phone.
reviews.author: Richie Lord

reviews.comment: This is one of the best novelty apps I have ever downloaded. Great job, can\'t wait till the updates roll in, this is ducking awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must for any fan
reviews.comment: This is brilliant, there is only one tiny issue I have and that\'s when you are swinging your phone, like Liono does, you quite often accidentally activate \"Sight Beyond Sight\".  Also, I would like if during the \"Hooooooooo\", could the screen light up, so it seems that we are projecting the Thundercat\'s symbol in the sky.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really ,
reviews.comment: Really, Cool app ;) , but i wish u could switch between the the symbol and the eye.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Could be a bit smoother from sound to sound, but a neat app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works better on sensation. But awsome. Please please do a he-man sword of greyskull.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app! thundercats hoooooo! Brings bk fab memories x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freakin love this app
reviews.comment: It brings back all those childhood memories of pretending to be a superhero. Please update soon with sight beyond sight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Probably the greatest app I will ever own.
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait to see how the sight beyond site works!  Transformer Prime ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most Awsome Ever!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Pure genius! I will cherish this app always!  Th th th THANK YOU!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME app + tribute
reviews.comment: Works well ... would prefer a revision that allows switching b/w 80s & 2011 motifs, if possible ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait for the sight beyond sight improvements!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsum but...
reviews.comment: to be perfect it needs to be in sword form like the lightsaber apps, and it should b able to grow from dagger to full length sword in 3 stages including curling of the hilt guard and transformation of eye to cat symbol. and the sight beyond sight should be eye form w animation of curling the hilt guard.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Soooooo much fun :-D A suggested update would be to maybe add the 2011 version of the Thundercats call :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: brilliant
reviews.comment: at first i thought this was a bit dull until i read you could use phone like... the sword of omens... brilliant.. just brilliant app... one thing i would like is right after the \"hooo\" part you could add the roar of the cat?
reviews.author: Martin Little

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: The only thing that keeps me from giving it 5 is that it\'s too easy to accidentally activate the Sight Beyond Sight button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: For the fans
reviews.comment: Love it...all it needs is the sword, make grow with the thunders..and you become the best app maker on Android.
reviews.author: A Google User
